summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5787 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, 2 and 3, Seaboard Addition, being a continuous alley between Fauntleroy Avenue and 30th Avenue Southwest, from West Charlestown Street to Admiral Way; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76346, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
